channel.title: The Command Prompt
channel.description:
ok, i suck using command prompt, the only thing i really found out to do on myself is open stuff and in typing "START <something here>" then press enter, like for a web site qand for programs and stuff like that. i noticed one of my old friends was using command prompt to run a moparscape server, can someone explain how i can do the same? to run my own server?
please just make it simple and tell me what to type in or explain what else i have to do before it will work.
Ty Sage :D[br][size=1]Posted on: March 22, 2007, 12:14:20 PM[/size][hr]can i atleast get some kind of advice? -.-; i know gamers can be lazy, i am one but this is a bit ridiculas ((excuse me if i spelled it wrong))

item.title: The Command Prompt

item.description:
@neosenchi wrote:

ok, i suck using command prompt, the only thing i really found out to do on myself is open stuff and in typing "START " then press enter, like for a web site qand for programs and stuff like that.
i noticed one of my old friends was using command prompt to run a moparscape server, can someone explain how i can do the same? to run my own server?
